content.p: Students will work with lecturers who have taught around the world, published in top journals and won research grants and consultancies. To learn more about the kinds of things we are interested in here at the School of Politics and International Relations, see a political concept explained in 60 seconds: Visit out 'Politics in 60 Seconds' archive. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8253 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8019
